National_Poison_Control_Number_1-800-222.text:
Will connect you to the closest poison control center to your location.
Operates 24/7/365

Background.text:
56 Poison Control (PC) centers cover the entire population of the United States
[1]
These centers received 3.06 million calls for service in 2013. (of which 2.2 million were for human exposure consultation)
[1]

External_Links.text:
CDC Medical Management Guidelines (MMGs)
American Association of Poison Control Centers
